name: The F.A. Premier League Football Manager 2000
description: Bringing the world of football management to the PlayStation, The F.A. Premier League Football Manager 2000 allows you to take control of any football team within the 4 English football divisions with all the right player and manager names for the 2000 season. Control everything from changing match tactics and team formations, buying and selling players on the transfer market, dealing with the finances, team building including training and youth club training. All designed for the PlayStation control system allowing simple fast access to the game without tedious learning of control systems and sub menus associated with PC management games. This is a pick up and play football manager game for the console market.
